install.name: JComments Latest
install.author: smart
install.description: Show latest comments or latest commented content items

param.name: type
param.label: Module Mode
param.description: Allows you to control which type of latest items to display in the module

param.name: mambots
param.label: Enable Mambots
param.description: Enable JComments mambots processing

param.name: sectionid
param.label: Set section
param.description: Selects comments from a specific Section

param.name: exclude_sectionid
param.label: Exclude sections
param.description: Exclude comments from a specific Section or set of Section (to specify more than one Section, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: catid
param.label: Set category
param.description: Selects comments from a specific Category

param.name: exclude_catid
param.label: Exclude categories
param.description: Excludes comments from a specific Category or set of Categories (to specify more than one Category, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: object_group
param.label: Source
param.description: Component or Components to display comments from

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display

param.name: length
param.label: Max. number of characters
param.description: The number of characters to display

param.name: showcomments
param.label: Show comments count
param.description: Show number of comments next to each item

param.name: avatar
param.label: Show avatar
param.description: Show user avatar in module. Require installed avatar plugin

param.name: avatar_size
param.label: Avatar Size
param.description: Width of avatar image

param.name: showsmiles
param.label: Show smiles
param.description: Select whether to show smiles as text or as images

param.name: show_date
param.label: Show comment date
param.description: Show comment date

param.name: show_author
param.label: Show author comment
param.description: Show author comment

param.name: show_object_title
param.label: Show object title
param.description: Show title of commented object

param.name: limit_object_title
param.label: Limit chars for object title
param.description: Limit chars for object title

param.name: show_comment_text
param.label: Comment text style
param.description: Select comment text style
param.option: Show as plain text with Readmore link

param.name: label4more
param.label: Label for readmore
param.description: Custom your readmore link text

param.name: label4author
param.label: Label for comment author
param.description: Custom label for author

param.name: dateformat
param.label: Date format
param.description: Enter specific date format

param.name: show_full_rss
param.label: Show full RSS
param.description: Show RSS feed for all site comments

param.name: label4rss
param.label: Alt for RSS
param.description: Set alternate text for RSS-icon

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
